name: The Bard's Song
desc:
Now you all know
The bards and their <input type="text" value="" data-result="songs" />
When hours have <input type="text" value="" data-result="gone" /> by
I'll close my <input type="text" value="" data-result="eyes" />
In a world far away
We may <input type="text" value="" data-result="meet" /> again
But now hear my <input type="text" value="" data-result="song" />
About the <input type="text" value="" data-result="dawn" /> of the night
Let's <input type="text" value="" data-result="sing" /> the bards' song

Tomorrow will take us <input type="text" value="" data-result="away" />
Far from <input type="text" value="" data-result="home" />
No one will ever know our <input type="text" value="" data-result="names" />
But the bards' songs will <input type="text" value="" data-result="remain" />
Tomorrow will take it <input type="text" value="" data-result="away" />
The fear of <input type="text" value="" data-result="today" />
It will be gone
Due to our <input type="text" value="" data-result="magic" /> songs

There's only one song
Left in my <input type="text" value="" data-result="mind" />
Tales of a <input type="text" value="" data-result="brave" /> man
Who lived far from here
Now the bard songs are <input type="text" value="" data-result="over" />
And it's time to <input type="text" value="" data-result="leave" />
No one should ask you for the <input type="text" value="" data-result="name" /> of the one
Who tells the <input type="text" value="" data-result="story" />

Tomorrow will take us <input type="text" value="" data-result="away" />
Far from <input type="text" value="" data-result="home" />
No one will ever know our <input type="text" value="" data-result="names" />
But the bards' songs will <input type="text" value="" data-result="remain" />
Tomorrow all will be <input type="text" value="" data-result="known" />
And you're not <input type="text" value="" data-result="alone" />
So don't be <input type="text" value="" data-result="afraid" />
In the <input type="text" value="" data-result="dark" /> and cold
'Cause the bards' songs will <input type="text" value="" data-result="remain" />
They all will <input type="text" value="" data-result="remain" />

In my <input type="text" value="" data-result="thoughts" /> and in my dreams
They're always in my <input type="text" value="" data-result="mind" />
These songs of hobbits, dwarves and men
And elves
Come close your <input type="text" value="" data-result="eyes" />
You can <input type="text" value="" data-result="see" /> them, too
